issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
With Max cores set to 8 I would expect 8 to be the EC2 Compute total. Sadly, only 7 are reported. I had terminated 1 instance from the system but did not run reporting until after that so I am not sure if originally 8 were reported.

fields.summary: Reporting: capacity report shows incorrect number of total EC2 Compute

comments.body: NC has only 37GB and would require 40GB to accommodate 8 5GB instances. Reporting is correct
